title: Bike Storage & Maintenance Stations, Gas Range
posting_body: ['New Apartments for an Entirely New World!', 'The creative mind sees many things.', 'It has the ability to visualize and embrace an entirely new world of possibilities when only a spark of an idea exists.', 'Welcome to Elan Menlo Park — the ideal, intimate setting for innovators and visionaries such as yourself.', 'These brand new apartments in Menlo Park, CA truly feel like home with proximity to major employers.', 'Elan Menlo Park is a small enclave of residences which are on point for luxury, design, convenience and comfort.', 'Enjoy nearby recreation such as hiking, outdoor sports or explore the natural scenic wonders and bike trails along the water.', 'Take advantage of cultural and educational events at nearby venues as well.', 'You’ll appreciate easy access to a vibrant downtown scene with Art & Music on the Square, plus unique restaurants and shops.', 'Take a ride on Caltrain to access all that San Francisco and San Jose have to offer.', 'Live brighter, better, and bolder at Elan Menlo Park.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 97', 'OR Text', '97', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 976-1003 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Large Balconies', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Walk-in Showers*', '- Modern Plank Hard Surface Flooring', '- Ceramic tile in Baths', '- Air Conditioning', '- In-home Washer/Dryer', '- Custom Kitchen Islands*', '- Undermount Sinks', '- Gas Range', '- Built-In Microwaves', '- Full Tile Kitchen Backsplash', '- 9 Foot Ceilings', '- Pendant Lighting', '- Dual-Toned Cabinets', '- Spacious Walk-in Closets*', '- Quartz Kitchen and Bath Countertops', '*Select Residences Only', 'Community Amenities', '- Large Landscaped Interior Courtyards with Wi-Fi', '- 2 Miles from Facebook Headquarters', '- Resident Lounge with Wi-Fi', '- Pet Friendly with Pet Walk Area', '- Entertainment Courtyard with Outdoor Fire Pit & BBQ Grills', '- Club-Quality Fitness Center', '- 10 Minutes to Downtown Menlo Park', '- Bike Storage & Maintenance Stations', '- Attached Garages', '- Covered Parking', '- Easy Access to CA-84 & 101 Fwy', '- Resort-Inspired Saltwater Pool & Spa', '- 10 Minute Drive to Palo Alto / Redwood City', '- 4-Minute Walk to the Marsh Road Shuttle', '- Automated Package Delivery System', '- Under Unit Garages', '- Adjacent to the Scenic & Convenient Bay Trail', '- Gated Resident Access', 'Pet Policy', 'up to 2 pets (either cat or dog) per dwelling.', 'Pets are subject to a $50 monthly fee and dogs are subject to certain breed restrictions.', 'All Pets require a $500 pet deposit.', 'Income Requirements:', 'In order to qualify you must make at least 3x the monthly rent.', '(gross not net.)', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Thursday:10:00AM-7:00PM', 'Friday-Sunday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Elan Menlo Park', '3645 Haven Ave, Menlo Park, CA, 94025', 'sQ0xEgnO']
